column5: Was just wondering if anyone else saw the story in the London free press that a possible metre long asian carp was caught off of Sarnia. They are attempting to confirm it. Not good.Not sure how to post links yet but just did a search for London Free Press and found it.

I think this is the link...http://lfpress.ca/newsstand/News/Local/200...371878-sun.html   Not good but it was going to happen sooner or later. I am not sure what can be done but hopefully somebody comes up with something.
